en: React is a declarative, efficient, and flexible JavaScript library for building user interfaces, maintained by Facebook. At Xanthous Tech, we use React to build user-facing part of the project, on browsers and mobile devices.

GraphQL is a query language and execution engine tied to any backend service maintained by Facebook. At Xanthous we use GraphQL extensively to build production grade projects with rich data presentation, which effectively provide smooth collaboration between frontend and backend developers.
zh: GraphQL是Facebook制定的数据查询语言规范。

en: gRPC is a high-performance, open-source universal RPC framework by Google. At Xanthous Tech, we use gRPC to construct microservice architecture coordinating between different backend programming languages, without sacrificing individual developer productivity and happiness.
zh: gRPC是谷歌开源的一个RPC框架。

en: Amazon Web Services offers reliable, scalable, and inexpensive cloud computing services. At Xanthous Tech, we have several AWS Solutions Architects with deep knowledge on how to effectively build and maintain AWS Stacks to achieve their full potential, and scale out as needed.
zh: 亚马逊云服务AWS是行业领先的云服务。

en: AWS Lambda is a core computing unit in the AWS Serverless Stack. At Xanthous Tech, we know how to effectively use AWS Lambda to build complex serverless data pipelines at low cost.
zh: AWS Lambda是亚马逊云服务推出的无服务器云函数组件。
